meta_description: The Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper is a limited edition, handmade romper crafted from 100% cotton. Perfect for special occasions or everyday wear. Ethically made in Sri Lanka.
product_description: The Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper by Maison Sunny is a truly special piece, perfect for any occasion. This limited edition romper is carefully handmade from 100% soft cotton, ensuring comfort for your little one. The delicate details and traditional design make it an heirloom piece to cherish. Suitable for everyday play or special events, this romper is a beautiful addition to your baby's wardrobe. Ethically made by skilled artisan women in Colombo, Sri Lanka, your purchase supports their work and contributes to a sustainable community. Dress your little sailor in comfort and style with the Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper.

meta_description: Celebrate your little one's 2nd birthday with this adorable Albetta Bunny Toy. Made with soft, snuggly fabric and featuring a hand-crocheted '2' and removable organic towelling bottoms. A perfect gift for toddlers!
product_description: Celebrate your little one's second birthday with the adorable Albetta 2nd Birthday Bunny Toy! This soft and snuggly plush bunny is the perfect gift for toddlers. Crafted from a luxurious, soft fabric, this bunny features a hand-crocheted '2' on its top, adding a unique and personalized touch. The cute and matching organic towelling bottoms are fully removable, allowing for versatile play and easy cleaning. This charming bunny is sure to become a cherished companion for your little one. The Albetta 2nd Birthday Bunny Toy encourages imaginative play and provides comfort and cuddles for toddlers. Its high-quality construction ensures durability and long-lasting enjoyment. Give the gift of a lifetime with this special birthday bunny. Height: 32cm.

specifications.Material: Soft plush fabric, Organic cotton towelling
